title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc

content.text:
1. January 1, 2000: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc is founded.
2. March 15, 2005: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc goes public and lists its stock on the NASDAQ exchange under the ticker symbol 'KIOR'.
3. November 10, 2010: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc announces a 2-for-1 stock split, effectively doubling the number of outstanding shares.
4. July 1, 2012: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc acquires a smaller pharmaceutical company, expanding its product portfolio.
5. September 5, 2014: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc undergoes a 3-for-1 reverse stock split, consolidating the number of outstanding shares.
6. December 31, 2018: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc completes a merger with another pharmaceutical company, forming a larger entity.
7. August 15, 2020: Kiora Pharmaceuticals Inc announces a special dividend to its shareholders.
